name: Ghostborn

skills.name: Energy Bolt
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 50% base chance (100% booked) to place 60% Dec DEF.

skills.book_value: Medium: +50% debuff chance (50%→100%) for Dec DEF uptime.
skills.notes: Single-hit A1. Books to 100% Dec DEF chance for consistent debuff uptime.

skills.name: Petrify
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE attack. Base: 1.0x ATK. SPD scaling: +1% damage per 1 SPD (formula: 1 ATK × (2 + SPD/100)). At 200 SPD: 1×(2+2)=4.0 ATK total. At 250 SPD: 1×(2+2.5)=4.5 ATK total.
75% base chance (100% booked) to place 100% Heal Reduction. CRITICAL for blocking enemy healing in Faction Wars, Arena, Doom Tower.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +25% debuff chance (75%→100%), -1 cooldown (4→3). Must book for Heal Reduction uptime.
skills.notes: AoE Heal Reduction (100% shutdown healing). SPD scaling damage - build 200+ SPD for max damage. Must book for 100% Heal Reduction chance and 3-turn cooldown.

skills.name: Ancestral Spirits
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE nuke. 3.8x ATK multiplier per target.
75% base chance (100% booked) to place 60% Dec DEF. CANNOT BE RESISTED (ignores RES stat, no ACC check). Guaranteed land if proc succeeds.
Places 50% Inc ATK on all allies for 2 turns. No ACC check. Team-wide damage boost.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +25% debuff chance (75%→100% Dec DEF), -1 cooldown (5→4). Must book for main nuke.
skills.notes: PRIMARY NUKE: AoE damage + Dec DEF (cannot be resisted) + Inc ATK team buff. Dec DEF guaranteed land if proc succeeds (no ACC/RES check). Must book for 100% Dec DEF chance and 4-turn cooldown. Use after A1 Dec DEF for max damage.

skills.name: Ancestral Shield [P]
skills.description: When attacked, has a 30% chance of placing a [Shield] buff equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns. Only activates once per hit.

effects.notes: 30% chance to place Shield (20% Ghostborn MAX HP) on all allies when attacked. Only activates once per hit (not per multi-hit). At 40000 HP: 8000 Shield value. Excellent team protection passive.

skills.notes: Team Shield passive. 30% proc chance when Ghostborn is attacked. Shield value = 20% Ghostborn MAX HP (build HP for stronger shields). Only activates once per hit. Excellent for Faction Wars/Doom Tower team survivability.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 65.
forms.comments: AoE nuker + team buffer + team protection. A3 Dec DEF cannot be resisted. A2 Heal Reduction shuts down healing. Passive Shield protects team. Excellent for Barbarians Faction Wars (9/10) and dungeons (8/10). Must book A2/A3 for 100% debuff chances and cooldown reduction.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC for debuffs.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 200+ SPD (A2 SPD scaling damage + speed tuning), 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC (Heal Reduction/Dec DEF), 40000+ HP (Shield value for passive). Savage or Cruel sets for nuking waves.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ SPD (speed nuker), 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG (nuke damage), 200+ ACC (Dec DEF), 40000+ HP (Shield). Not top-tier for Arena (7/10) but usable.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC (Heal Reduction CRITICAL for boss waves), 40000+ HP (passive Shield value for team survivability). Savage or Cruel sets for wave clear. +65 ACC Faction Crypts aura excellent.

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (single-hit A1/A2/A3, Warmaster optimal for A3 3.8 ATK nuke)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for debuffs), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (single-hit AoE nuker, A3 3.8 ATK multiplier)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for Heal Reduction/Dec DEF), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Ruthless Ambush, CYCLE OF VIOLENCE (cooldown reduction on kill for chaining A3 nukes)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (AoE nuker for wave clear + boss damage)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Resurgent, Delay Death, DETERRENCE (reduces incoming damage for team protection synergy with passive Shield)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC CRITICAL for Heal Reduction on boss waves), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2/A3 cycling), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc ATK buff on allies for longer damage boost)
masteries.general: Warmaster for all content (single-hit A1/A2/A3, A3 3.8 ATK nuke is main damage). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns for more nuking). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for Heal Reduction/Dec DEF uptime). Deterrence (reduces incoming damage, synergizes with passive Shield for team protection). Lasting Gifts (extends Inc ATK buff duration). Must book A2/A3 for 100% debuff chances and cooldown reduction. Focus: Barbarians Faction Wars (9/10) + dungeons (8/10). User Priority: Faction Wars (Priority 5) - Barbarians completed Normal, Ghostborn key for Hard progression with Heal Reduction + team Shield + +65 ACC aura.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams)
Soul Reap (cooldown reduction on kill for Arena/Dungeons)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 nuke when available, A2 for Heal Reduction. Passive Shield triggers automatically. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Excellent AoE nuker + support for Faction Wars and dungeons.

mechanics_advisory: AoE nuker with team support. A3 'Ancestral Spirits' is PRIMARY NUKE: 3.8 ATK AoE damage + 60% Dec DEF (CANNOT BE RESISTED - no ACC check if proc succeeds) + 50% Inc ATK team buff. A2 'Petrify' is Heal Reduction specialist (100% shutdown healing, CRITICAL for Faction Wars boss waves and Doom Tower). A1 places Dec DEF with 100% chance when booked. Passive 'Ancestral Shield' gives team 20% MAX HP Shield when attacked (30% proc, build 40000+ HP for stronger shields). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 100% debuff chances and cooldown reduction. Excellent for Barbarians Faction Wars (9/10) with +65 ACC Faction Crypts aura. Good for dungeons (8/10) with AoE wave clear + Heal Reduction. Build: 200+ SPD (A2 SPD scaling damage), 100% C.RATE, 220%+ C.DMG, 200+ ACC (Heal Reduction/Dec DEF), 40000+ HP (passive Shield value). Savage or Cruel sets for ignore DEF nuking. Warmaster for single-hit A3 nuke damage. Cycle of Magic CRITICAL for faster A2/A3 cycling. User Priority: Faction Wars (Priority 5) - Barbarians completed Normal, Ghostborn is key for Hard progression with Heal Reduction for boss waves, team Shield for survivability, and +65 ACC aura.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: AoE nuker for Barbarians Faction Wars. A3 Dec DEF cannot be resisted. A2 Heal Reduction CRITICAL for boss waves. Passive Shield protects team. Must book A2/A3. User priority: Barbarians FW Hard progression.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Faction Wars + dungeons focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades/RaidWiki.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from RaidWiki (HP/ATK/DEF/SPD/RES validated). OCR failed but RaidWiki 100% confidence.
